idField.name: Masked_Ticker
idField.description: Unique identifier for the stock. This is a masked ticker that replaced the original stock ticker.

forecastTarget.name: Adj Close
forecastTarget.description: Adjusted closing price of the stock; this is the target variable for forecasting.

pastCovariates.name: Close
pastCovariates.description: Recorded closing price of the stock on the day.

pastCovariates.name: High
pastCovariates.description: Recorded high (maximum) price of the during the day.

pastCovariates.name: Low
pastCovariates.description: Recorded low (minimum) price of the during the day.

pastCovariates.name: Open
pastCovariates.description: Recorded opening price of the stock on the day.

pastCovariates.name: Volume
pastCovariates.description: Recorded volume of stocks traded during the day.
